# Plots{background-color='pink'}

* A good graph is a great way to show your findings

* Not all evidence is about hypothesis tests

* "Give the viewer the greatest number of ideas in the shortest time with the least ink in the smallest space", Tufte, _[The Visual Display of Quantitative
Information](https://www.edwardtufte.com/book/the-visual-display-of-quantitative-information/)_
